name: travel_delays
rows: Utility work on MCKNIGHT RD / EVERGREEN RD northbound at SIEBERT RD. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on US 30 westbound at Exit: PA 340 - THORNDALE. There is a lane restriction.
Multi vehicle crash on I-83 northbound 1.3 miles south of Exit 21A: US 30 EAST - ARSENAL RD. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on PA 403 both directions between FRANKLIN ST and FRANKLIN ST, HICKORY ST. There is a lane restriction.
Multi vehicle crash on PA 33 northbound at Exit: BELFAST. There is a lane restriction.
Downed tree in wires on JACKS MOUNTAIN RD / WILLS RD both directions between (CENTRE County Line)+ LITTLE KANSAS RD, KANSAS RD and FRONT MOUNTAIN RD. All lanes closed.
Crash on I-81 northbound at Exit 69: PROGRESS AVENUE. There is a lane restriction.
Debris on roadway on HARBISON AV / ARAMINGO AV both directions at Exit: I-95 SOUTH - DELAWARE EXPRESSWAY. There is a ramp restriction.

Moving roadwork on I-84 eastbound between 5 miles west of Exit 17: PA 191 - HAMLIN/NEWFOUNDLAND and .4 miles west of Exit : NY Line. There is a traffic disruption.

Roadwork on PA 130 westbound 0 miles WEST of CEDAR ST. There is a lane restriction.
